Coordinates: 58°22′57″N 45°29′39″E ﻿ / ﻿58.382534°N 45.494091°E﻿ / 58.382534; 45.494091 The Sharya Forest Museum Railway (Russian: Узкоколейная железная дорога Шарьинского музея леса) is a 750 mm (2 ft 5 1⁄2 in)-gauge forest railway based at open-air Sharya Forest Museum located in Sharya, opened in 2014.[1]
